A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I feel underwhelmed....  This movie had all the promise and hope in the world and really just let out a big \"it doesn't matter\" to all the past star wars legacies\, and history. Who was Snoke\, who cares\, who was Rey it doesn't matter\, little jedi training who cares. In speaking with friends who also watched the movie it seems to have taken on the watered down role that much else has in our society has\, and this was very much \"Jedi Lite\"
